name: SayHello
0:
”Alexa open say hello.”
”Alexa launch say hello.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: say hello
des:
Do you want to say hello, but you're not sure how? Use this skill to have Alexa say hello for you!

Not only will Alexa say "hello," but she will say "hello" in a large variety of interesting ways. From informal greetings for your closest friends to more formal greetings for visiting dignitaries. This skill has a variety of "hellos" to suit every situation!

To use, simply say, "Alexa open Say Hello!"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
